title: No Distractions
description: A Firefox browser extension that temporarily blocks distracting websites to help users focus.

title: DegreeInsight.io
description: A web application that lets students plan course roadmaps toward their graduation.
technologies: TypeScript, Angular, Material, Adobe XD, HTML, CSS, Agile
responsibilities: Collaborated with a team of senior university students to develop a web application that helps students plan out when to take courses in order to graduate in time.
Deliberated with teammates to identify needed technologies to formulate thetech stack to be used.
Designed UI/UX mockups and prototypes to provide visual representation during development.
Architected and implemented responsive front-end UI interfaces for various feature specs such as student profile and term planning dashboard.

title: Spartan Agenda
description: A web application lets user create to-do lists to organize their tasks.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Docker
responsibilities: Engineered RESTful APIs and utilized JSON Web Tokens and Spring Security to secure them.
Programmed a user authentication API complete with salting/hashing of passwords and credentials validation

title: Abode.city
description: A web application that simulates a hotel booking app.
technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, NodeJS, MongoDB, Express, Material UI, HTML, CSS, Agile
responsibilities: Developed a web application that simulates a hotel booking website with a team of fellow engineering students.
Drafted UI mockups for the landing page, hotel search page, and city description pages.
Built the front-end for the hotel search and city description feature specs complete with search result filtering and page responsiveness.

title: Byte Drive
description: An iOS app that lets users store files and images in the cloud.

title: Text Encryptor
description: A web application that lets users encrypt/decrypt text files or input using simple crypto algorithms.

title: Spartanstop.com
description: A web application that simulates an e-commerce app.
technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, NodeJS, MongoDB, Express, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Agile
responsibilities: Built the front-end of the search products by category and food recipes features.
Implemented the corresponding back-end support for the food recipes featurewhich queriesand servesdata from a MongoDB instance.
